short_description: RESAMPLE AN ANNOTATION FILE TO DIFFERENT MESHES
help_text:
Resample an annotation file from the source mesh to the target mesh.

Only annotations in surface space are modified, no changes are made to annotations in other spaces.  The -surface-pair option may be repeated for additional structures used by surface space annotations.

repeatable_options.description: pair of surfaces for resampling surface annotations for one structure

params.description: the midthickness surface of the current mesh the annotations use
the midthickness surface of the mesh the annotations should be transferred to
